data.lyric:
[ti:Consequences (orchestra)]
[ar:Camila Cabello]
[al:Consequences (Orchestra)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Consequences (Orchestra) - Camila Cabello (卡米拉·卡贝洛)
[00:02.48]词：Camila Cabello/Amy Wadge/Nicolle Galyon/Emily Weisband
[00:04.96]曲：Camila Cabello/Amy Wadge/Nicolle Galyon/Emily Weisband
[00:07.44]Dirty tissues trust issues
[00:10.69]Glasses on the sink they didn't fix you
[00:14.07]Lonely pillows in a stranger's bed
[00:16.99]Little voices in my head
[00:20.89]Secret keeping stop the bleeding
[00:24.46]Lost a little weight because I wasn't eating
[00:27.76]All the souls that I can't listen to to tell the truth
[00:33.07]Loving you was young and wild and free
[00:39.78]Loving you was cool and hot and sweet
[00:46.69]Loving you was sunshine safe and sound
[00:51.69]A steady place to let down my defenses
[00:58.44]But loving you had consequences
[01:05.57]Hesitation awkward conversation
[01:09.07]Running on low expectation
[01:12.38]Every siren that I was ignoring
[01:16.26]I'm paying for it
[01:17.78]Loving you was young and wild and free
[01:24.36]Loving you was cool and hot and sweet
[01:31.28]Loving you was sunshine safe and sound
[01:36.31]A steady place to let down my defenses
[01:43.09]But loving you had consequences
[01:48.85]No ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[01:55.39]Said no ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[02:01.53]I no ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh mhm
[02:09.28]Loving you was dumb dark and cheap
[02:15.81]Loving you will still take shots at me
[02:22.56]From loving you was sunshine but then it poured
[02:27.80]And I lost so much more than my senses
[02:34.64]'Cause loving you had consequences
[02:45.30]Loving you
data.trans:
[ti:Consequences (orchestra)]
[ar:Camila Cabello]
[al:Consequences (Orchestra)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.48]//
[00:04.96]//
[00:07.44]肮脏的纸巾拭不去我们之间的信任问题
[00:10.69]水池里乱糟糟的玻璃杯也帮不上忙
[00:14.07]陌生人的床上 孤独的枕头
[00:16.99]脑海里有个微小的声音萦绕不休
[00:20.89]对一切守口如瓶 独自舔舐滴血的伤口
[00:24.46]又瘦了一些因为我没什么胃口
[00:27.76]我不愿聆听心底的倾诉 诉说残酷的真相
[00:33.07]爱你的时候青春年少 放纵不羁 无拘无束
[00:39.78]爱你冷酷有时 炽热有时 甜蜜有时
[00:46.69]爱你如沐暖阳 自在温暖
[00:51.69]那是让我卸下所有防备的安逸之所
[00:58.44]但爱你也会带来不可预料的后果
[01:05.57]徘徊不前 我们也只是尴尬的敷衍
[01:09.07]渐渐对你不抱有太高的期待
[01:12.38]曾忽略所有的危险信号
[01:16.26]我不过是自食其果吧
[01:17.78]爱你的时候青春年少 放纵不羁 无拘无束
[01:24.36]爱你冷酷有时 炽热有时 甜蜜有时
[01:31.28]爱你如沐暖阳 自在温暖
[01:36.31]那是让我卸下所有防备的安逸之所
[01:43.09]但爱你也会带来不可预料的后果
[01:48.85]//
[01:55.39]//
[02:01.53]//
[02:09.28]爱你是盲目无知任性愚蠢的决定
[02:15.81]爱你依然是我致命的弱点
[02:22.56]爱你如沐暖阳 但光芒总会消散黯淡
[02:27.80]为了爱你 我所失去的远胜于那短暂的欢愉
[02:34.64]因为爱你会带来不可预料的后果
[02:45.30]爱你
